en-US.summary: Fighting game that is turned based
examplePhrases: ask powers to pick a character
ask powers to view my stats
en-US.name: Powers
en-US.description: Powers is a turn based fighting game that has some great user interface and fun voice that sounds like a robot, that is your fighter helper companion.
